about_the_game:
Invaden is a multi-player, tactical first person shooter. The setting is present day. Fight as the NWD (New World Domination) or as the Rebels in various locations around the globe.
Play up to 7 vs 7 online, or a mixture of players and AI, or play with AI only. The game currently features 10 maps, some are close quarters, others mid size, and a couple larger ones that are great for snipers. Maps vary from cities and towns to wilderness settings.
Invaden features a wide selection of weapons, from the Scar, MP5 to the K98 and STG44. Invaden implements Frags, Smoke, Flash-Bang, melee weapons, health syringe, medi-packs and ammo-packs.
Currently there are three game modes; Domination, Team Death Match and Death Match. Also there are 3 kill streaks; uav, airstrike and attack helicopter. And
a 40 tier ranking system. Also implementing Steam Leaderboards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600, or equivalent.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You can play against the AI if no internet available.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, or equialent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You can play against the AI if no internet available.
